name: Feather Hair Clip/Extension for long hair
description:
Check out my etsy to see more products!
http://www.etsy.com/shop/kelseysfeathers?ref=si_shop
Falls similarly to this one: http://www.etsy.com/transaction/53430348

This specific feather extension is different because it has two bundles of feathers spaced across one piece of leather-like strand. This allows more feathers to flow even better through your hair. You can bobby pin any piece of the leather if you would like in order to place the two bundles in different parts of your hair. Or just let it hang from the extension clip, to flow beautifully all the way down your hair! This specific extension is PERFECT for someone with long hair.

These handcrafted feather hair extensions are a fun accessory to add to your style! 
Each is made with a variety of real feathers that blend well with your hair. 
It's a clip on, which allows you to move the accessory around according to your hair style and take it out whenever you want to. They work well with your hair down, pony tails, messy buns, etc. The comb-like clip is meant for hair extensions, stays in place well, and you don't need to worry about it falling out.
You can curl or straighten the feathers as you would your own hair. They make the perfect accessory to compliment your hair color and overall style, and you can wear them with literally everything!
And... they’re made with love! :)
Contact me if you have any questions: 
email: kelseys_feathers [!at] yahoo.com
I have lots to choose from and am always in the process of adding more! check out: http://www.etsy.com/people/kelseysfeathers?ref=si
Make sure to look under my “sold” items to see what other stuff I make! :)

name: Peacock Feather Hair Clip/Extension
description:
Check out my Etsy to see more products!
http://www.etsy.com/shop/kelseysfeathers?ref=si_shop

Very pretty extension! 2 leather-like strands with beads and 2 tiers of feathers that blend so well with each other. Peacock feather stem is cut short so that it isn't firm and so it will flow well with your hair along with the other feathers.
